title: ID: 1975 Chevy Corvette Stingray logo
content:
Looking for a font that matches for a 3d model I'm making of the car. I haven't found a font that's as close as I would like, so any help would be appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130728132838im_/http:/typophile.com/files/75emblem_6542.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [75emblem.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130728132838/http:/typophile.com/files/75emblem.jpg) | 24.02 KB |
author: xfilesangel

comments.content:
This was probably designed by hand.

Check out [Part 7](http://web.archive.org/web/20130728132838/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg1.html) of Mike Y's Script ID Guide for similar fonts.

- Lex

[Shirley Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130728132838/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000048#specimen) is about as close as I could find.

- Lex
